data.text: @katefroehlich46 Hola, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@0xKaren Hola, We will ask for updates and we will contact you as soon as possible. Regards
@KimFRoberts Hola Kim, please send by a DM all the information to the company where you purchased the ticket. Thank you.
@WishingOnGreen Hola, the gift cards can be use at the Iberia site and unfortunately can´t be refund. Regards.
@Lmcolm Hola Luis, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@Nabuels Thank you, we got it. We will reply to it. Regards.

@yazminamoy Hola Yazmin, please send us in a DM with the details of your query and your booking code to check the available options. Kind Regards.

https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@drsoniabarnes Hola Sonia, Send us a DM with as much info as possible, please remember to include your reference number, PIR and full contact details. Thank you.
@marktribe Hola Mark, we replies to your DM, did you opened another claim? If so we can check the updates from here. Regards.

@paomazacoquis Hola Paola, necesitamos saber todos los detalles sobre el bono al que te refieres para poder orientarte de forma correcta. Envíanos un mensaje directo https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6 para poder ayudarte. Saludos.

@Coolman2996 Hola, could you please try to access the account through our mobile app? If the error persists, please send us a DM with your IBPlus number, full name, email address and a screenshot from the error message https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@Nabuels Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your PIR reference and full name https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

data.text: @WishingOnGreen Hola, we've just replied your DM. The ''error'' you received isn't actually an error. Unfortunately, the flights you are trying to book are operated by Level and American Airlines, while the gift card only works to pay for flights operated by Iberia, Iberia Express or Air Nostrum

@juliaoup Hola Julia, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Unfortunately, the bag still hasn't been located. As soon as our baggage centre has any news about the bag, you'll receive a SMS or email. Kind regards
@Lmcolm Hola Luis, we can see that a new PIR was opened for you. In order to check the new PIR reference, please use your old PIR number to access the tracing website at https://t.co/P60eOiMvWp
@catslovedevon Hola, we're sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with more details https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@smdoung We'll contact the relevant department once again and keep you posted. Best regards

data.text: @smdoung Our baggage centre asked the handling agents at JFK airport to arrange the baggage pick up. However, our colleagues still haven't received an answer. So, if you prefer, you can take the bag to the airport. Kind regards
@cr12356789 Hola, we've just replied your DM
@smdoung Hello, Shannon. Please you should take the luggage to the airport because there´s no new about anyone from the airport pickin up the luggage from you. Kind regards
@DeeSeoDee Hola, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. Regards
@Attika2022 Hola Attika, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. Regards

@Jennystaleyyah1 Hola Jenny, thank you for contacting us, could you please give us by DM your booking code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@pampjpj Hola Pam, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. Regards
@j_fernandez_g Hola Jennifer, revisamos, seguimos por esa vía. Saludos
@cheunghk5 Hola cheung, thank you for contacting us, we have replied your DM. Regards

@AlisonFranck Hola Alison. We have escalated the case with the department in charge, requesting more details to give you more information.
Regards
@ssousamari_ Hola Mari, we replied to your DM. Regards.

@Lmcolm Hola Luis. We are sorry to read what you mention, the search for your luggage continues, if there is any update we will notify you.
Regards.
@RyYkMr Hola, we replied to your DM. Regards.

@Semyaj Hola Jayme. We have requested details about your case from the corresponding area. As soon as they provide us with information, we will contact you.
We appreciate your patience.
@tiny_chad Hola, we replied to your DM. Regards.

@VergaraLautaro Hola. We replied to your DM. Please review.
Regards.
@eternal_expanse Hola, we don´t know the details of what happened, please send a DM with more information so we can help you. We remain at your disposal. Regards
@VergaraLautaro You can do it through the following link: https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6 Kind regards.
@vivika13 You are welcome, Viviane. Regards.
@AmitZarchi Hello. Sorry for the delay in our response. We have already replied to the Dm you sent us. Kind regards.

@ralphie440DOM Hello, Rafael. We apologize for any inconvenience that may have arisen. Please send us a DM with all the details of your file. In the same way, we suggest you edit or delete this comment since it exposes your personal information in a public way. Kind regards.
@_JuanManuel_ Hello. We apologize for the incident with the luggage. Please send us a direct message with all the details of your case. We will be attentive to your response. Kind regards.
@vivika13 Hello. We have already responded to the message sent by the passenger you mentioned. Kind regards.
@ssousamari_ Hello. Please let us know. How we can help you? Kind regards.
@VergaraLautaro Hello. Please send us a direct message with all the details of your case. In this way we can indicate the appropriate procedure. Kind regards.

@sarahlaclau Hello. We are very sorry for the inconvenience, as we indicated before, the baggage area is the only channel to obtain updates on your case. From here we could not indicate different information. Kind regards.

@j_fernandez_g Hola Jennifer, sentimos que el proceso en el aeropuerto haya tenido dificultades, si deseas revisemos puntualmente envíanos detalles adicionales en un md, un saludo https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@MIZ_BIOS Hello. You can request the expenses you have incurred for having been without your suitcase for the first few days, once you receive the piece, if you kept the invoices for the essential items, because you will need them to be able to request reimbursement, /1
@BoveZilla Hello, Michael. We have responded to your query through a direct message. Kind regards.
@sanfran1975 Hola Francisco, could you tell us if you state in your report the permanent address in  Australia? Please let us know by DM. Thank you.

@sanfran1975 Hola Francisco, from social media we just can follow your case and inform you if we have updates, to check this matter directly with the luggage department please consult directly with our luggage colleagues through the following line +34 901 111 342. Kind regards.
@tiny_chad Hola Chad, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@rettascroggs2 Hola Loretta, we will check this internally and contact you as soon as possible. Regards.
@sarahlaclau Hola Sarah, the CEO of Iberia is:  Javier Sánchez-Prieto . Regards
@Lmcolm Hola Luis, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. Regards

@MarixaFox Hola Marixa, desconocemos los detalles de lo ocurrido. Para poder ayudarte desde este canal, envíanos un MD (https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6) con todos los detalles que consideres relevantes, además de tu código de reserva y número de billete (075*****). Quedamos atentos, saludos

@elenlp Hola Elena, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us all details by DM including your booking code, ticket number and if you opened a baggage claim at the desk in the aiport with Iberia? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@sarahlaclau We are very sorry for what you tell us. Currently we do not have the email you request enabled, in the same way we will be very attentive to your case. Regards.

@sarahlaclau The address currently registered is in Malaga and is valid until July 31. On the other hand, the address is permanent in Cannes. You should keep in mind that the update takes a few hours. If a modification is necessary, it will be necessary to insist by telephone. Kind regards.
@sarahlaclau In this case if you are going to change the place of your stay. You can make the modification right there with the Baggage Center. We reiterate our apologies. Kind regards.
@xo4n Hello. We understand that it may be an incident on the web. We suggest trying it in a few hours. If the error persists, please let us know again. Kind regards.
@ChloeAlvarez18 Hello. We apologize for the inconvenience that occurred. From here we remain attentive to any comments or additional queries. Kind regards.
@sarahlaclau Hello, Sarah. We are very sorry for any inconvenience that may have arisen. We hope that you can contact us as soon as possible. Regards.
@MesHo1924 Hello. We have responded to your query through a direct message. Regards.

data.text: @agomes_47 Hello. We are very sorry that you have that impression. If we can help anything from here, please let us know. Kind regards.
@xo4n Hello. Thanks for writing to us. Please let us know which route and travel dates you are selecting. We will be attentive to your response. Kind regards.

@lemerym Hello Monya. Please provide us through direct message your claim file number (i.e 20220730-13245678) so we'd be able to consult from here. 
Thank you and kind regards,
@sanfran1975 Hola Francisco, we will follow the case in your partner profile. Regards.
@C4tchDi Hola C4tchDi, your PIR belongs to TUI, please contact with them directly in order to check the details. Thank you.
@PrincessDuggan Hola Princess Lala, we replied to your DM. Regards.

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @Pyriax Hola Sasha, we are very sorry to read about these incidents. We suggest you to issue a claim through our website https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG so we can follow up on your case. Kind regards.
@RyYkMr Hola, we have replied to your DMs. Kind regards.
@ranakherad Hola Rana, we have replied to your DMs. Kind regards.

@C4tchDi Hola, we are very sorry to read this. Did you report this incident directly at the airport counters? Please let us know, you can send us a DM with all the details so we can have a look. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@ranakherad Hola Rana, we are truly sorry to read about that. Could you please, send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) with any detail you could consider important so that we could review your case? We remain at your disposal. Regards.

@julianasuprstar Hola Julianna, we are truly sorry to read about that. Could you please, send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) with any detail you could consider important so that we could review your case? We remain at your disposal. Regards.
@juliaoup Hola Julia. We have replied to your DM. Regards.
@KentuckyDiane Hola Diane, we have replied to your direct messages. We will continue the conversation through that channel. Kind regards.
@kxrubii Hola, share with us more details about your query by private message https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa and we will try to help you. Kind regards.
@Mikaykay997 Hola Mikaela, send us a private message https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa with the details about your comment so we can help you. Kind regards.
@focusmm64 Hola, we're sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your email address and the gift card codes https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@rophster Hola, we're deeply sorry. Please send us a DM with the PIR reference number and your full name https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@SusanRFajardo Susan, lamentamos no poder indicarte algo diferente desde redes. Tan pronto tengamos respuesta del departamento encargado, te informamos.
@rophster Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Could you send us a DM with the PIR reference number and your full name? https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@Janet03343339 Hola Janet, we're sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@goldgangsneaker Hola, we're sorry for the delay and have just replied your DM. Kind regards
@djs_113 Hola Dan, we're sorry to read this. Could you send us a DM with the claim reference number, your full name and email address? https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@raphaelbarone Hola Raphael. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@sdeezyyyy Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please send us a DM with your PIR reference number and full name? https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

urls.title: Time limits
urls.description: See deadline for boarding and check-in by which time customers must have completed the process of admission to Iberia flights.

data.text: @leachster Hola, the check-in opens 2h before the departure, but we advise our passengers to arrive 2h30 before the flight, so that any unexpected delay on the way to the airport doesn't affect your boarding. Here you find more info about the check-in times https://t.co/iIqdg2jRMY
@leeinengland Hola Lee, we're sorry for the inconvenience and have just replied your DMs

data.text: @bmarsh1983 Hola Brennan, we're sorry for the inconvenience. If the flight was operated by Vueling, please open a PIR (property irregularity report) with their agents at the airport, so they can assist you about the missing luggage. Best regards
@emmabaker10 We're glad to read this, Emma! We remain at your disposal :)
@cjbfxck Hola, please send us a DM with your IBPlus account, email address, full name and more details about your query https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@Jessica14228579 Regarding the flight change, she must contact her travel agency. Unfortunately, they are the only ones that can assist her with such change. We've just replied her private messages. Best regards
@Jessica14228579 Unfortunately, we are still waiting for an update from the baggage center about Maria's PIR. We'll get back to her as soon as we have any news. Kind regards

@Jessica14228579 Hola Nelson, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM all details including your booking code, ticket number, registered email and full passenger name to verify the information? Thanks in advance
@guypratt Guy, we are sorry to read this, as soon as the deliver process has initiated our colleagues will contact you with all details, we really appreciate your patience. Kind regards

@marktribe Hola Mark, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM all details of your claim including booking code, ticket number , registered email and if you opened a complaint the case number? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@guypratt you'll need them to claim reimbursement once the bag has been delivered. We appreciate your patience. Best regards

@guypratt Hola Guy, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience. As soon as the delivery process has been initiated, you'll receive a SMS or email with further details. For now, please keep the original invoices related to the first necessity expenses for being without luggage, as /1
@roughstuff Hola, we are sorry to read this, could you tell us by DM all details of your inquiry? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@leeinengland Hola Lee, we are sorry to read this, could you tell us by DM all details of your situation? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
